description: An Electron app which finds out some meaningful topics from PDF files by Latent Dirichlet Allocation using SCVB0 inference method
README.md:
# PDFTopicker

PDFTopickerhaLun Wen nadoFu Shu noPDFhuairukaraikutsukano[topitsuku] woChou Chu suruapuridesu. 
topitsukuwoYong iteFu Shu noPDFhuairuwoYao Yue saserukotode, Yi tsuYi tsunoPDFhuairuwoJian zuniQuan Ti noHua Ti woBa Wo surukotogadekimasu. 
apurikeshiyonhaElectron( http://electron.atom.io )woYong iteGou Cheng sareteori, topitsukuwoChou Chu suruarugorizumutoshite
Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA)woYong iteimasu. matasonoTui Lun Shou Fa toshiteKDD2013deTi An saretaStochastic Collapsed Variational Bayesian Inference ( http://arxiv.org/abs/1305.2452 ) toiuShou Fa woJavaScriptdeShi Zhuang shimashita. 


## Shi iFang 

Yi Xia nokomandodeapuriworokarunikuronshi, Qi Dong shimasu. (OS XnomideDong Zuo Que Ren Ji mi)

```bash
git clone https://github.com/naruaway/PDFTopicker.git && cd PDFTopicker && npm install && npm start
```
apuriQi Dong Hou , Shang Bu no'drop here'toShu itearuzonniPDFhuairuwodorotsupushitekudasai. (Ying Yu noPDFnomiDui Ying )
dorotsupusaretahuairuniDui shiteZi Dong De niQian Chu Li gaZou ri, Chu Li Ji minohuairuhaXia Bu no'Processed Files'niYi Dong shimasu. 
PDFhuairuniyotsutehaChu Li gaumakuikazu, Chu Li gaZhi matsuteshimauChang He gaarimasu. konoyounaChang He haapuriwoZai Qi Dong shiteChu Li Ke Neng naPDFhuairunomiwodorotsupushiZhi shitekudasai. 
![Jie Xi Qian noHua Mian ](images/before-analyzing.png)


Fen Xi Dui Xiang toshitaihuairugasubete'Processed Files'niarukotowoQue Ren shitekara, 'Start Analyzing'botanwoYa sutoFen Xi gaKai Shi shimasu. 
Fen Xi Zhong Liao Hou , Chou Chu sareta5tsunotopitsukugaBiao Shi saremasu. Shang Wei noDan Yu hodosonotopitsukuwoyoriTe Zheng Fu keruYu tonatsuteimasu. 
![topitsukuYi Lan Hua Mian ](images/topics.png)
